title: The Best British Short Stories of 1922
creator: Various
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of The Best British Short Stories of 1922. Read by David Wales. Twenty-four short stories by famous and not-so-famous British authors. (Summary by David Wales) Note: A shortened section 21 was replaced on Dec 30, 2014 with the full text. For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. Download M4B 00-14 (206MB) Download M4B 15-26 (166MB)
subject: LibriVox; audio book; short-stories

reviews.reviewbody: An eclectic collection of tales and most were interesting and all of them were well read.  This selection is worth the time.
reviews.reviewtitle: The Best British Short Stories of 1922
